name: Noble & Knightess - Episode1
description:
*Not mechanical translation.

Story：
The Kingdom of Elstein...
A flourishing land with a history spanning over 1000 years.
This grand nation rules over half of the continent.
Noble born first princess to the Elstein royalty, Elize,
loves her subjects and likewise, in return, is loved back.
With Anna, her guardian knightess and childhood friend
the two were living happy peaceful lives...

However, Elize had a niggling worry at the back of her head.
That was, that there was a discrepancy between the Elize
which her citizens desired and Elize's TRUE inner self.

This gap... between ideal and reality, naturally causes her stress
and slowly but surely, the desire to show her inner self grows stronger...

She craves for more thrill, more stimulation, more pleasure...

Her desire know no bounds and stirring
up a storm of depravity, her best friend and the kingdom itself,
is drawn into a whirlpool of salacious self destruction...

Feature：
You see, on the inside, Elize is a timid, mentally fragile girl,
with an over active, anxiety inducing sense of self consciousness.
You will experience knightess and unlimited levels of corruptive in a medieval fantasy setting!

Content：
AVG game, easy operation
Beautiful picture and text, easy access to the story
Japanese dubbing, let you experience the story as real.
